org.ambraproject.rhino.service

Interface ClassificationService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClassificationServiceImpl

    public interface ClassificationService
    Service class that deals with the hierarchy of taxonomic terms as they relate to the articles in a given journal.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Transceiver read(String journal, String parent)
      Forwards the child terms of a given taxonomic subject area to the receiver, along with the counts of children for each child.

    • Method Detail

      • read

        Transceiver read(String journal,
               String parent)
                 throws IOException
        Forwards the child terms of a given taxonomic subject area to the receiver, along with the counts of children for each child.
        Parameters:
        journal - journal key specifying the journal
        parent - the parent subject category that we will return children for. If null or empty, the root of the hierarchy will be used.
        Throws:
        IOException
